Cyber Threat Intelligence at Scale
Tell Me More

Overview

Holmes Processing was born out of our need to rapidly process and analyze large volumes of threat intelligence data. The distributed architecture allows the system to scale horizontally while also providing the flexible needed to evolve to the ever changing landscape of computer security. Whether you have thousands or millions of objects, Holmes Processing can easily help you extract useful information and generate meaningful intelligence.

Fast

3.1ms to process each sample on commodity hardware


Robust

0 critical errors


Easy

Services use a RESTful API and JSON

Pillars

The cyber threats are exponentially growing in size, constantly evolving, and deliberately attempting to thwart security practices. As such, the Holmes Processing Framework is based upon 3 core pillars.

Resilient

Component failures should not affect other components. Systems should identify and then gracefully recover from errors.

Scalable

The system should scale to handle any type of work load. It should be capable of automatically expanding across public and private infrastructures.

Flexible

Components should be interchangeable and adding new features should require minimal effort.

Projects

Holmes Processing is comprised of multiple projects. Each project can be used individually or combined together to create one large system.

Holmes-Totem

Holmes Totem performs feature extraction given any object type.

Skald

Skald is the architectural diagram and blue print for Holmes system.

Holmes-Toolbox

Holmes Toolbox provides helper scripts for managing and interacting with the Holmes System.

  • Code: Repository
  • Documentation: Read The Docs
  • Category: Helper Agent

Holmes Storage

The Storage Planner manages access to all data within the Holmes Processing system. It orchestrates the interaction across multiple Databases, serves the files for analysis, etc.

  • Code: Repository
  • Documentation: Read The Docs
  • Category: Core Component

Holmes-Frontend

The Holmes Frontend provides a simple web interface for interacting with the Holmes system. This is currently under heavy development and will be released shortly.

  • Code: Repository
  • Documentation: Read The Docs
  • Category: Helper Agent
